name: A
value: Adequate and well-controlled studies have failed to demonstrate a risk to the fetus in the first trimester of pregnancy (and there is no evidence of risk in later trimesters).

name: B
value: Animal reproduction studies have failed to demonstrate a risk to the fetus and there are no adequate and well-controlled studies in pregnant women.

name: C
value: Animal reproduction studies have shown an adverse effect on the fetus and there are no adequate and well-controlled studies in humans
column4: but potential benefits may warrant use of the drug in pregnant women despite potential risks.

name: D
value: There is positive evidence of human fetal risk based on adverse reaction data from investigational or marketing experience or studies in humans
column4: but potential benefits may warrant use of the drug in pregnant women despite potential risks.

name: X
value: Studies in animals or humans have demonstrated fetal abnormalities and/or there is positive evidence of human fetal risk based on adverse reaction data from investigational or marketing experience
column4: and the risks involved in use of the drug in pregnant women clearly outweigh potential benefits.

name: I
value: Substances in this schedule have no currently accepted medical use in the United States
column4: a lack of accepted safety for use under medical supervision
column5: and a high potential for abuse.

name: II
value: Substances in this schedule have a high potential for abuse which may lead to severe psychological or physical dependence.

name: IIN
value: Substances in this schedule have a high potential for abuse which may lead to severe psychological or physical dependence.

name: III
value: Substances in this schedule have a potential for abuse less than substances in Schedules I or II and abuse may lead to moderate or low physical dependence or high psychological dependence.

name: IIIN
value: Substances in this schedule have a potential for abuse less than substances in Schedules I or II and abuse may lead to moderate or low physical dependence or high psychological dependence.

name: IV
value: Substances in this schedule have a low potential for abuse relative to substances in Schedule III.

name: V
value: Substances in this schedule have a low potential for abuse relative to substances listed in Schedule IV and consist primarily of preparations containing limited quantities of certain narcotics.
